explains: n. 司法部，司法系统；法官，审判员
adj. 司法的，法官的，法院的

sentences.en: The judiciary must think very hard before jailing nonviolent offenders.
sentences.cn: 司法部在把非暴力罪犯投入监狱之前一定要慎重考虑。

sentences.en: The government, the executive and the judiciary are supposed to be separate.
sentences.cn: 政府、行政和司法应该彼此分立。

sentences.en: This is the fifth and probably final day of testimony before the Senate Judiciary Committee.
sentences.cn: 这是第5天，也可能是最后一天在参议院司法委员会面前作证。
